title: The Python Chronicles
description: A programmer gets trapped in his own code and must fight to escape a digital apocalypse.

title: Data Dreams
description: In a world driven by information, a group of students uncovers a secret AI project gone rogue.

title: Spark Wars
description: Two engineers battle for control of a revolutionary energy source that could save or destroy the world.

title: ETL Life
description: Explore the hidden world of data pipelines, from servers to dashboards, told through real-life tech workers.

title: Streaming Tales
description: A group of struggling filmmakers try to break into the OTT world—one awkward pitch at a time.

title: Machine Learning: The Series
description: A dramatized series exploring breakthroughs in AI through historical lenses and imagined futures.

title: Big Data Secrets
description: A whistleblower uncovers a secret government surveillance system—and becomes the next target.

title: Cloud Nine
description: A Parisian startup finds success—then chaos—as its cloud empire threatens to collapse under pressure.

title: AI Unplugged
description: A visual journey into artificial intelligence, told through the lens of Japanese innovation and philosophy.

title: Pipeline Diaries
description: A group of tech misfits travel across South America building data pipelines—one mishap at a time.
